attributes.action: Jerusalem for the English National Anthem
attributes.additional_details: We, as a country, are in a new modern era and so I believe that it is time for a new national anthem. Jerusalem is a rousing and uplifting anthem which I think deserves to be at the forefront of our national teams. God Save The Queen has so far been a good enough anthem but it is time for a change.

rejection.details: Anthems that are played at sporting events are the decision of the relevant sporting body.
